summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of land and other property in the southwest one-quarter of the northeast one-quarter of Section 4, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., for park and playground purposes under Ordinance No. 78386, Cause No. 417021; accepting certain condemnation awards therein; making an appropriation by way of a loan from the Cumulative Reserve Fund to pay said awards, and providing for the repayment of said loan.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
